name: Giant Trees
description: Massive trees that tower above the forest canopy create unique ecosystems and potential magical properties. The size and age can indicate magical properties or ancient wisdom, while the unique ecosystem supports specialized wildlife.
atmosphere: Ancient trees of enormous size dominate the forest while their massive trunks could house entire communities. Specialized ecosystems exist in the canopy as the venerable giants have witnessed centuries of change. Living monuments to the patience and power of nature.
